text:
Ranbir - Alia Spend Some Quality Time Together In New York With Rishi And Neetu Kapoor
Ranbir - Alia Spend Some Quality Time Together In New York With Rishi And Neetu Kapoor
It's a tough time for Ranbir Kapoor's family as Rishi Kapoor is currently in the US, where he is on a medical leave. Rishi is getting immense support from his family including son Ranbir and wife Neetu Kapoor.
Twitter
To extend support to the Kapoor family, Ranbir's 'rumored' girlfriend and co-star Alia Bhatt was seen around the family.
Pictures of Ranbir and Alia hanging out in New York is doing the rounds on the internet and it's safe to assume that she is being a supportive girlfriend.
On the professional front, Ranbir will be next seen in Ayan Mukherji’s Brahmastra, which will also star Amitabh Bachchan, Alia Bhatt, Nagarjuna, and Mouni Roy. Alia, on the other hand, is juggling between Kalank and her brand endorsements. Here are the pictures that are floating on the internet.

Alia, on the other hand, is juggling between Kalank and her brand endorsements.
